item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Testing Resistance - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Testing Resistance - NEWSBTC

Key Highlights ETH price after a couple of spikes lower against the US Dollar managed to recover. There is a new bearish trend line formed along with a support on the hourly chart (data feed via SimpleFX) of ETH/USD. A break either lower or higher is needed for the next move in ETH/USD.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Struggle Continues - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Struggle Continues - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price slowly moved down from the $11.20 high and currently under a minor bearish pressure versus the US Dollar. Ethereum price slowly moved down from the $11.20 high and currently under a minor bearish pressure versus the US Dollar. ETH price moved down during the past few sessions against the US Dollar, and struggled to gain traction.

item.title: The Crypto Show with Ladar Levison of Lavabit and Cliff Baltzley of StashCrypto
item.description:
The Crypto Show with Ladar Levison of Lavabit and Cliff Baltzley of StashCrypto

Tonight Ladar Levison and Cliff Baltzley join us in studio for a technically difficult but fun time. Aside from the technical descriptions and technical difficulties with our network we had a great time and shared some great info. Very fun episode Original air date 8/28/16 on LogosRadioNetwork Sponsored by CryproCompare.com & Anarchapulco.com Links: http://Anarchapulco.com coupon code: Crypto http://DarkMail.info http://StashCrypto.com http://TheCryptoShow.com http://Free...

item.title: Australia's Cyber-Intelligence Team to Focus on Financial Threats
item.description:
Australia's Cyber-Intelligence Team to Focus on Financial Threats

On August 25, 2016, Australia's Minister of Finance, Malcolm Keenan, Also read: Atlanta's Blockchain Enthusiasts Take an In-Depth Look at Dash announced that the Australian Transaction Reports & Analysis Centre (AUSTRAC) , will be launching a new cyber-intelligence team.

item.description:

item.title: Bitcoin News for the week of 8/22/16
item.description:
Bitcoin News for the week of 8/22/16

Welcome to our weekly bitcoin news recap, where we cover top headlines and stories in the world of bitcoin each week. This week a compelling TED Talk from Don Tapscott about bitcoin and blockchain technology was released; it's a must-see video and we've embedded it below.

item.title: New All-Time Highs in LocalBitcoins Volumes in Russia and the United States ~ Razor Forex
item.description:
New All-Time Highs in LocalBitcoins Volumes in Russia and the United States ~ Razor Forex

Russians have really started to warm up to Bitcoin this year. Charts from Coin.dance show a new all-time high volume on LocalBitcoins for the week ending 2016-08-20: 215,548,659 Roubles ($3,353,277 at the current USD/RUB exchange rate of 64.28) in digital currency trades.

item.title: FinCEN Proposes New AML Guidelines For Unregulated Financial Service Providers
item.description:
FinCEN Proposes New AML Guidelines For Unregulated Financial Service Providers

Various financial services providers in the US are still unregulated to this very day. Some of the Bitcoin companies will certainly fall into this category, but there are also banks that need to step up their game. FinCEN created a new proposal which introduces new AML requirements for these unregulated providers.
